byline.original: By CAMILLE M. CIANFARRA By Telephone to TEH NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: expects neutralization of Mittelhauser army in Syria to weaken Brit position
snippet: ROME, June 30--The Italian communique tonight reports "considerable activity" on the LibyanEgyptian frontier, where Italian troops are said to have repulsed attacks of British motorized columns....

headline.main: ITALIANS' STRATEGY REMAINS DEFENSIVE; Rome Claims Gains on Libyan Border, but Is Avoiding Entangling Egypt BRITISH HIT AT ERITREA Two Armored Cars, in Nubian Frontier Attacks, Rout 1,200 Fascist Horsemen Colonial Fighting Held Down Claims Downing of British Planes Armored Cars Battle Cavalry Malta Has Two Raids in Day

lead_paragraph: ROME, June 30--The Italian communique tonight reports "considerable activity" on the LibyanEgyptian frontier, where Italian troops are said to have repulsed attacks of British motorized columns.
